creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: standing woman closing a red and white floral robe-like garment with pink lining; woman holes a long, thin green tie in her mouth; L2001.372.177 is a sketch for this print

medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica and embossing
title: Woman in a Long Undergarment
